website_summaries.verdict: Incredibly practical and elegant at the same time. Resin holds up to weather and looks great while doing so.
pros: Large enough to serve as a bench for two people
Very sturdy and easy to assemble
cons: A few owners mentioned receiving damaged or warped parts with their boxes

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before I bought this bench. Some of the negative reviews concerned me, but I bought it anyway at a discount price. As I followed the directions I realized that some of the problems people complained about were probably caused from trying to skip or not following each step in detail. When I finished putting the bench together I also noticed that it needed to be on a perfectly flat floor. If not it, caused a slight twist to the box and the lid would not fit correctly. It's better on a deck or concrete patio. I also added two eye bolts to the lid on the the bench to tye the pad to.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Description INACCURATE (any members surprised?)
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows off white box with brown seat; received a solid dark brown bench box. I grow tired of Sellers (including Amazon) failing to accurately describe their products. Even worse, they leave it to the "buying community" to help slowly push descriptions into the land of accuracy. The consequences of returned items or disappointed members must not mean much to Amazon. Shame on Amazon for permitting the bar to be lowered. Size and power promotes apathy. FWIW Amazon: Greater than two-thirds of my returns are based on inaccurate information-- info pertinent to my decision to purchase! Get it right, not later, now.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin LemonJello

customer_reviews.title: Unstable backboard - poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I got a lemon, when comparing to other reviews. But, the item I received had big problems with the back attachments. Completely unstable and parts did not snap in place. One part got stuck with out securing and when I pulled it out, it broke. And, the other side did not secure either, but I did not pull out, in fear of breaking it, and then have no back. I will have to use duck tape to secure the one side. Also, when you pick up the item to move it, the back board and side unsnap.
customer_reviews.author: Cclucky13

customer_reviews.title: Not as thick and sturdy as I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: Decent bench. It's a bit flimsy for the price, I was expecting plastic to be a bit more thick and sturdy. It was super easy to put together and the instructions were easy to follow. It's sturdy enough to hold two adults and a child (we tried). Looks nice and we're pleased, just took a star off because I was expecting a thicker, sturdier plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mschvusangel

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: there is nothing good about this bench it is the most cheapest piece of junk it just snaps together barely the floor is nothing but a piece of plastic you can't out anything in there I got it for my pool chemicals and the bottom came apart when I put a jug of chlorine inside when you sit on the bench it sinks down there is no way 771 lbs would hold I would of returned it but the box got soaked from a passing thunder shower oh well!
customer_reviews.author: geno c

customer_reviews.title: Very Difficult to put together
customer_reviews.text: Had I not damaged the box that it was shipped in, I would have sent it back. The instructions suggest you just have marry up pieces , put them together until they “click “ and you’re done. In reality, after getting things lined up and ready to go became an impossible one person task. Tried rubber hammer, pushing together from every angle... Bottom line, it became a two person job, with one person holding pieces together, and the second person pulling down with there entire weight.. Have put many things together in my lifetime, and this was the absolute worst. CANNOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: No, no, no
customer_reviews.text: The box went together easily. Looks nice. We purchased it to store and protect our cushions from patio set. A rather expensive Winston set. the first time it rained everything got wet. The second time the top and bottom cushions were soaked. The middle two, had wet areas in the center of the seats. There was about an inch of water in the bottom when I removed everything to drip and dry out. So angry right now that we spent the money on this...
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Flaharty

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $120
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty crappy. The plastic is basically the thinnest it could be to stay standing. The idea of the lock is so laughable that I didn't even bother screwing it on, the seat barely connects with the plastic hinges at the back so it could be pulled open by a child, even if locked. If this were $60 dollars Id consider buying it again. If you don't plan on putting much weight on it, or moving it often, it might last long enough to be worth the price to you. If you want to use it for children's toys, they will probably destroy the seat relatively quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Pursual

customer_reviews.title: Becarefull, you will not get any support from the seller.
customer_reviews.text: Would like to rate higher but due to NO response from seller I will rate with one star. Product would not completely seat together on one arm. I tried everything I could to get it to lock into place and it wouldn’t. Ultimately tried tapping with a rubber mallet and knocked a hole in the plastic and it still didn’t lock together. Any acknowledgement from the seller and I would have rated better because overall the bench is a good buy for the price (had the arm locked in place like it should have).
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money... Cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: The box was ridulously hard to put together and I am an intelligent person who has assembled many pieces. The directions were not adequate, only pictures not words. When I put the very last piece on, the bench seat, it would not line up and "click" like the directions indicated. When trying to line up inserts, a piece of the back panel cracked! I was thinking about ordering a second one so I would have matching benches but now I wish I hadn't ordered this one!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: Am giving this two stars because it fits my space perfectly and the dimensions were as advertised. That's about the only positive thing I can say, aside from the fast (as usual) Amazon shipping. The product is poorly made, the pieces don't fit together seamlessly (many gaps), and the lighter colored product was simply gross looking (it looked dirty, had terrible smudges over it that are permanent, etc.). No one has sat on it (I'm not sure whether I'd be comfortable using it for seating). Needless to say, Keter collected my money one time. It won't again. And companies wonder why they go out of business.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made with poster board bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made; poster board for the bottom so doesn’t secure hardly anything. Also, lots of plastic mold bits left over, some holes not cut properly, some pieces already splitting when brand new and not left in the sun, at least once delivered (see photo). It works for basic storage that looks like a chair, but I expected more for the money. This is a $70 bench tops in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bair

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product and service
customer_reviews.text: I received this fast. I was very pleased to see how easy it was for me to put it together. The storage area is a good size I am hoping it will hold 6 cushions I am replacing. It seems very sturdy and well made. I did have a issue with the seat not 'clicking' into place. I called the phone number provided in the instructions and Keter is sending me a replacement seat. The person I talked to was very nice and happy to help me out. I love good customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: just shopping

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fast shipping and not hard to put together. Very deep and sturdy too. This is my third bench . One is on the porch to store humming bird feeders when not being used. Second is on back porch and third is at our pond. It holds the fish & duck feed. It will hold, 4 of those 5 gal. buckets plus room for several loaf's of bread for feeding. Sorry not great pic of bench, it by the pond. You can't go wrong with this bench seat if your looking for something to last outside in the weather or on a patio. Comfortable to sit on too!
customer_reviews.author: Suanne B.

customer_reviews.title: As sturdy as wood.
customer_reviews.text: I though this would hold 4 large seat and back cushions, it didn't. I ended up keeping this and ordering something else for the cushions. We use this as extra outdoor seating, and storage. We had 2 140 lb adults sitting on this, and it held up well. It was as sturdy as a wooden bench/storage. We do not have this up against a wall, it's free standing. We have it under a carport, and close enough where the wind mists the rain on it, it hasn't seeped through. It hasn't received a thorough soaking, so I can not comment on how waterproof it is.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It is pretty easy to assemble, looks good, is very practical, and does exactly what it is supposed to. It's a really nice way to store pool cleaning equipment on my lani and gives extra seating options for large parties/outdoor seating. Seems sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chivas

customer_reviews.title: Pool Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect addition to add to our pool-side deck! We wanted something we could keep small floats and equipment in that would also be durable in the weather. This has already been through many large storms with no complaint yet! We threw some fun summer pillows on top to give it a home-like feel. We can fit 2 child floats, 2 adult floats (mesh centers w/head and foot pillows), vacuum head and hose, and water wings plus child life jacket inside with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Seems to be standing up well in the few months we've had it. I like that we can fit our folding chairs inside of it for storage. If you're putting items inside you don't want to get wet I'd suggest putting inside an additional plastic container like I did for the pillows because it's not 100% water tight. Not the absolute highest quality but not junk either. It's a plastic bench after all. I think eventually I'll get a cushion for it since it's a little hard on the butt after a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney R.

customer_reviews.title: Most durable plastic storage bench
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I had one and recently ordered 3 more. Use them for pool storage and seating. It is durable enough for 200+ person to sit no problem. Plenty of storage inside. My 13yo assembles without too much difficulty. The critical thing for me was to be able to open the top while having the bench flush with wall, I had a cheaper one and it needed 2” clearance from wall and it was constantly getting nudged into the wall when you opened it
customer_reviews.author: Owen M.

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great, for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Went together pretty easily. Looks nice. It's still a plastic Rubbermaid looking bench. It's sturdy enough to sit on without feeling like it's going to collapse under you. And it holds a lot of stuff inside... Although it's not water tight. Rain gets in easily so beware of what you store in it. Also, the bottom is corrugated plastic, so nothing heavy can go inside. Mine came with a weird plastic blob in the back piece, a manufacturing defect I guess. But it's not bad enough to warrant packing that bastard up and sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: M. JACOBSON

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth $20
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap plastic materials. Came with the damaged package, and broken pieces. Not sturdy. Not able to sit 2 people, sakes when sits. I assembled already, and don't have a package. I'll trash it, looks bad in my backyard. Felt like a scam. Expected better quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ak Chow

customer_reviews.title: Great value and super handy!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m happy with my purchase. Dual purpose as a bench and outdoor storage, it’s exactly what I needed. It was easy to assemble alone, though a few parts didn’t quite line up properly to screw together. (A drill will fix it quick!) Some pieces are cheaply made with noticeable plastic seems that are peeling, but luckily they aren’t too noticeable. The lid/seat seems a little flimsy, and I worry that the weight capacity isn’t quite as written. Overall still a great product for the money. The storage is incredible for my many open bags of potting soil and garden tools.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Do your Research
customer_reviews.text: The Material is cheap so Thin the seat cracked on the Second day I wish I had done more research I wouldn't recommend this bench the bottom is checkey.
customer_reviews.author: HEAVENA

customer_reviews.title: Landfill Material
customer_reviews.text: Despite reading the reviews I persisted and got this deck box. Have had other Keter things in the past, and most were well made and sturdy. This bench/box isn't worth the time it took to put together. Pieces that were warped and didn't line up. Very little holding it together. I surely wouldn't allow anyone over 100 pounds to sit on on for fear it would fall apart. Putting a lock on it is ludicrous because one swift kick and the whole thing will fall apart. I would return it, but the box it came in was so thin and so badly damaged that isn't even possible.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for a little over $100
customer_reviews.text: It isn't high quality, but it's great value for the price. It's easy to assemble if you follow the directions. Each piece is labeled and the illustrated directions have an "x" for what not to do and a check for what to do. The packaging says that the bench can hold up to 771 lbs. I was hesitant that it would be sturdy enough to seat my 240lb husband and myself, but it held up well! I love that it has the dual function of seating and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kaycie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for over a year now. It has held up in sunlight, rain, snow and other weather conditions better than another brand we purchased. Easy to put together. Sturdy and comfortable to sit on. Cushions and other patio items fit perfectly inside the bench. No water seeped inside even in the hardest downpour rainfall that we received over the past year. We are well pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BECKY BW

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, Weather proof, ample storage
customer_reviews.text: This storage bench is exactly what we needed to store our gardening materials. I has plenty of space and is weather proof...and it looks nice. My husband and I both sit on it and feel it is very sturdy. You can even add a lock the storage box if you need to. The only thing I wish were different, is that the lock brackets be on the side; they are centered at the front of the seat...a lock would likely brush against the legs of people sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Marta de Tuya

customer_reviews.title: What I bought...
customer_reviews.text: This is what I bought; I get it. The directions provided were somewhat a challenge to follow at times-the plastic pieces putting together did present some issues (was missing a piece in the box but we made it work). Once it is set up, it does look nice; kind of lightweight though; was not as heavy as I thought but it does look nice once put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap parts
customer_reviews.text: Went together ok, but feels like it will break soon. Parts are not durable, one plug broken when assembling. The bottom was melted and warped. It went together but I'm waiting for it to fall out. The screws that hold the bottom in don't screw into anything, they aren't very secure. I think this was over priced. Will contact the the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes M. Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5 star.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together but Instructions are lacking. After fiddling with it for a while I got all the work. Design is great with steel beams to support the back and the front but not the seat. Seems like a pretty significant design flaw. The seat is sturdy enough for two light adults or kids but but don’t plan on having two large people sit on this thing. Storage is plentiful and it’s mostly water tight. A severe storm did get a little water inside but not enough to bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Motroutmo

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great bench
customer_reviews.text: When I was putting this together it seemed very flimsy, and I feared I had wasted my money. However, once the parts were aligned and fastened, it was surprisingly sturdy. It has made it thru fall, a very wet but mild winter and this far into spring and everything in it has stayed totally dry. Very pleased with this product. Would have been easier if I'd had a helper when assembling it, but I succeeded.
customer_reviews.author: SueAnn

customer_reviews.title: flimsy
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 large storage container from this manufacturer, they were wonderful, sturdy, easy to assemble. We decided to get the bench expecting the same quality. The panels are so thin & the quality was much to be desired. The back panel wouldn't "snap" into the bottom panel. Screws broke the plastic where they were to be screwed into. Very disappointed. I would like to send it back but it was such a pain to put together, it wasn't worth taking it apart & repacking it.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Do not be fooled by the product pictures
customer_reviews.text: The product looks very nice in the description but the real item is very poorly made with thin material and flimsy. It comes with assembly manual but the parts never click together in the assembly process and even cracked. You could hardly put them all together and when finally done it feels so fragile that I'd never sit on. The product pictures are very misleading as it appear to be sturdy and high quality but not so in reality. Buyers beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: KCUTBOY

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting too much, given that it's plastic, and primarily intended for storing packages delivered to the house or providing enough cover for packages left behind it. Tip: Put a weatherproof sign on the seat or backrest telling delivery people to place packages in the storage compartment. That's how good it is, as most delivery people don't realize it holds packages.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: A cute addition to our yard!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this bench is made of plastic and it’s a bit thinner than expected, but they included a few strategic metal reinforcement beams in order to achieve a nice combination of strength and light weight. Had no difficulty constructing it by myself although ideally you’d want two people for the easiest job building it. It took nothing more than a screwdriver to build. It’s strong enough for me to be comfortable sitting on it with my wife. I’m pleasantly surprised by the amount of space inside the box. Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Culley

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy but some issues with assembly
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions are fairly easy to understand. You will need a screwdriver to put this together. The parts that are supposed to click together sometimes were very difficult to get to click because of excess plastic not trimmed off after the moulding process in the factory. However, with extra effort and some prying with a flat-head screwdriver, I was able to complete the task.
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvements inside the storage platform, buttom floor
customer_reviews.text: Space saver, convenience, 2 people is requested to assemble so make sure you have a pal. The only thing is that would be great if it’s get improvement on the inside storage platform, it is as weak as cardbord but in a fancy color. We will have to create a sturdy “platform” for that to make it better. That is why we gave 3 stars because this really needs to be improve. Other than that the product works.
customer_reviews.author: Guana Me

customer_reviews.title: The picture online (color) is misleading...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the light colored one thinking it was cream color (what the picture online looked like). But it is actually tan/beige. It was also very complex to put together. And it doesn’t stay together very well. I don’t know if it’s waterproof yet because it hasn’t rained, but I can’t imagine it is. It comes apart at the side no matter how hard we tried to secure it. If it wasn’t so difficult to assemble and wasn’t so difficult to try to put it back into the box, I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Cracked bench after a couple months of purchasing
customer_reviews.text: My window to return was a month ago and it's already cracking! We have it in a covered area that gets morning sun and shade the rest of the afternoon. I LOVE this bench, but I'm saddened that it cracked and in such a short amount of time since purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench , very pleased
customer_reviews.text: It came very well packaged and came in one big box , not two . Very easy to put together approximately 20 - 30 min . Had a hard rain last night and everything inside stayed dry . Has a reinforced metal rod along the bench and another across the back which I like so it’s not flimsy and very light weight but I recommend it being on a porch or deck so it keeps it sturdy . A bench cushion fits it perfect and it sits two people nicely . I recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: D. B.

customer_reviews.title: Not hard to assemble, but the directions are not the best
customer_reviews.text: This bench/storage box provides a nice, dry place to store our patio chair cushions when we're not outside using them. It sits under a patio, so isn't subjected to extremes in wetness, but has had some water land on it, without leaking into storage area. I'm 230 lbs, and I can sit on this thing with no concerns. And it looks nice with everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: A nightmare to put together. Don't try this alone!!! It's a two person install.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice enough unit, not super well made though. It cracked while we were putting it together, and my husband felt it necessary to add some extra reinforcements to it to make it safe to sit on. But, after putting a few cushions on it, it's nice to conceal all our bbq items on the deck. + gives us extra seating area when we need it. Read direction well and make sure you put all pieces in correct order. They only fit one way.
customer_reviews.author: My time

customer_reviews.title: Close enough to perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: True color is khaki w/ dark brown seat. The Assembly is minimal, only a Phillips head screwdriver & rubber mallet needed. It took me an hour total to unpack & assemble. Its being used on the front porch for Amazon deliveries to be placed inside. For my needs this was a perfect find. The only down side to this item is there is not a steel rod for the hinge on the lid, the plastic just snaps in place. Maybe I can find a way to alter the hinge to my liking, its ok if my changes voids the warranty, I just want to secure whats stored.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I had a little wrought iron set out front & was looking for a bench with storage. The prices are CRAZY for benches, but I found this on Prime Day! My daughter & the neighborhood kids hang out in front of the house & love to leave things when it's time to head home! Barbies, helmets, sweatshirts & sidewalk chalk usually get left & I stack them up on a chair when I discover them. The bench went together super easy, directions were great & I think this is going to work out perfectly! The neighborhood lost & found is officially setup!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Cheat and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It is made of injection mold plastic. Looks cheap, feels flimsy and over price. I was afraid to sit on it. It will do until next spring when I will by some thing better. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer John

customer_reviews.title: Nice seating, solid
customer_reviews.text: I put 2 of these on my pontoon boat, they sit two comfortably but will hold 3. lots of storage beneath seat. no need to fasten them down, they don't slide around, but can easily move where you want them. When I started putting one together, I thought these are never going to be strong enough. Turns out they are made quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gwartney

customer_reviews.title: Love the look in my garden
customer_reviews.text: No problem putting this together but we are "professional DIYers". Love the look in my garden. Kids have been good about putting toys away in it now! Comfortableto sit on and in the hot Florida sun it doesn't draw the heat like metal or even wood does. Huge amount of room in it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hustus

customer_reviews.title: Nice but could be sturdier.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this product. It looks nice and sturdy but in fact the plastic is a bit thin. The instructions are very good. The problem is getting the pieces to fit properly together. The molding at the pieces are a bit shotty so you have to play with them to get them to fit. I couldn't, for the life of me, get one side of this unit to snap into place. I ended up breaking the plastic and had to JB Weld it back together. I would also recommend that no large person sit on this bench. It will not hold them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: So it was fairly easy to put together. I did it alone, maybe if I’d had a second person. It is meant to snap together. Some pieces do, some not so much. But the overall look is great. I got this to keep pool supplies and toys in. So far it’s doing the job, even though the plastic seemed pretty lightweight I have no worries about sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Donato P.

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy parts manufacture, little structural integrity
customer_reviews.text: This was indeed quite fast to put together (about 30 minutes), but right from the start the parts seemed to be really shoddy - little resin molding lips instead of clean cuts, cuts that don't fit properly into the clips on the other piece, the lid wouldn't close correctly without pushing it down to name a few. The really bad part is that the sides (armrest / side wall) is held onto the front/back pieces with little resin clips, but no actual structural strengthening (no screws, no L clamps, nothing). A hard push, kick, or simply kids having a fight has the potential to pop the side out completely.
customer_reviews.author: हृषाकेश

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough to hold cushions
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute bench, but it isn’t big enough to store cushions for our patio furniture, which is the purpose I bought it for. Also, there are places that the plastic wasn’t cut smoothly/accurately. It’s cute though & I’ll keep it. If you’re buying something specifically to fit in it, make sure you measure first.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber Merrill

customer_reviews.title: It’s Ok...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of space in the storage. The bench isn’t the easiest to put together. The locking system was not locking well due to leftover manufacturer leftover plastic. Needed to cut it off to lock and fit well. Also, the seat should have been a studier material. It dips in slightly when sitting on it. Hopefully over time it doesn’t give out.
customer_reviews.author: HIREP

customer_reviews.title: Nice Storage Bench!
customer_reviews.text: The storage bench was designed well and only one small hiccup at installation with the floor/bottom; however, I was able to work through this and it is fine and sturdy! Putting on the lock is optional and does not impact the install (I left it off as the hardware is in the center of the bench and not really needed for me!)
customer_reviews.author: David E. Pouliot

customer_reviews.title: Great box
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for the price. It takes about 20 min to put together but it's not bad. Its very sturdy although I have mine backed up against my house. So I'm not sure how sturdy it is whole leaning back but it seems okay. The bottom is a corrugated plastic so that would be more sturdy if they used solid plastic. The lock on this box is silly. Anyone could bust off the locking loops or just remove the back of the seat. But all in all this us a great item for the money. Pretty well built and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: TheEvan

customer_reviews.title: Great bench but arrived DAMAGED!!
customer_reviews.text: Actually really like the bench. It seems well made and was easy to assemble. The low rating is due to the fact that my bench arrived damaged. One of the arm rests had a decent sized crack. Did not notice until after it was almost fully assembled. Hope to get in contact with seller and will update rating accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Matches our new shed. We ordered this to use as storage for the pellets for our smoker grill. I was a little afraid it wouldn't be sturdy enough to hold the heavy pellet bags. I was wrong. It's perfect. All we need to get is a cushion, the seat gets hot in the sun. I was planning on a cushion anyway so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bench, but I’ve only had it two months and it already has a huge crack. We aren’t large people and have only sat on it a handful of times. We live in Iowa and just had huge winds which may have attributed to it? Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic
customer_reviews.text: I knew this thing wasn't going to be the best when I bought it, but it just is not good quality at all. It was relatively "easy" to assemble in that the the directions were simple and you only need one person and a screw driver. But the cheap plastic didn't line up, some of the pieces that were supposed to "click" in to place either were too big and I had to shave down with a razor blade to make it work or they were too small and just didn't "click" in to place. It will work for what it is but it is just not a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for toys!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to screw in bottom to side boards we didn’t somehow missed that step in instructions... I did follow them! So it’s left out I think. Middle and sides kept separating then husband screwed it on and ta da perfect. We use it for kid storage!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Morris

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this unless you like cheap products that snap together
customer_reviews.text: I find myself disappointed in this product. The injection molding was poor at best. You rely on snapping 80% of the piece together and if they don't fit it is usually because the molds bled through and you have to break out the Exacto knife and correct it. Also the floor, which I thought was packing material, is way to flimsy. Sad, just sad!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Assembly nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, difficult to assemble, difficult directions to follow, needed a second person to help put it together, used lots of duct tape to help put it together, and broke off 3 pieces putting it together. Before I use it I have to fix the parts that had pieces broken off. It looks OK as long as you don't look at the duct tape and the patch I put on it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul White

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was tricky to put together and sides we no where near as thick as we had assumed/hoped. When done it is strong enough, but design could be better. Top lid should be longer so that if their is water on it when you lift the lid, that water would fall behind the unit vs. pouring into the storage area, as it does. Overpriced for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Vidinha

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy, and leakproof
customer_reviews.text: This bench has been perfect for everything we wanted it for! The storage part holds quite a bit and doesn’t leak, the bench is sturdy enough for three adults to sit on, and it looks nice on the patio. The only downside is that the seat gets hot if it’s in the sun. We just bought three cheap seat cushions to go along the seat and haven’t had any issues still opening and closing it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient & looks nice !
customer_reviews.text: It arrived extremely quickly & wasn't that difficult to put together ! I've found that by being patient- & really reading the instructions- it procedes that much better ! I just got it for the "seat" & the occaisional storage. (Yes- it has a lock set up--but it's not "high security type" use intended ! ) So- it's a comfortable (& fairly large !) seat- under cover-outside-near my door. Handy ! & it looks nice too !
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ward

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk... unfortunately.  Have to return it
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this to work sooo bad. Perfect size... but really won't stay together. Piece of junk. Need it to be sturdy. This will NOT hold 2 adults - Barely will hold a teenagers weight (5'8 & 172 pounds!!!!) Shame. Such a nice looking product... just not strong. Will collapse!! !! !!
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, looks good, serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: Subtracted one star because the storage compartment is a bit flimsier than I was expecting, but it does hold all the items I put in there OK, so this is a rather minor nitpick. Still, you might want to avoid storing extra heavy items inside the storage compartment due to questionable durability / rigidity of the storage compartment's floor plate.
customer_reviews.author: Ron G

customer_reviews.title: Bench took care of a serious problem
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I recently built a very small home. A problem we found was when we came inside we had no where to place our dirty or muddy shoes. This bench provided a great seating area out on the porch along with being able to store our shoes inside of the bench. I can simply open the lid pull out my house slippers, sit down, change my shoes and store them in the bench which is wher proof.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. I wait to post anything about it to make sure it held up to its spec's. And it has! I do have it under cover, but I use it for my pool chemicals - acids and chlorine mostly. It was worth the money. I would say that I would buy it again... But I do not have too. It is in GREAT condition!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: The top of the bench (brown piece) cover was delivered broken and I tried several times to get a replacement part and seller never responded to my emails and calls. The top is letting in dirt and water and I want to return it
customer_reviews.author: Angela Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Great! Easy to assemble and Looks Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Really satisfied with this garden bench. It serves the purpose I needed, to store away my garden tools, while looking nice. It was easy to assemble, the instructions were simple pictures, and everything was labeled. No missing parts. My husband helped me but the prices are lightweight and could be assembled by one person. The only complaint I would have is that it seems used; there were also a few areas where the plastic was broken, but it didn’t effect the assembly or sturdiness of it so I’m not really stressing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy plastic with poor fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality fit and finish and flimsy parts that don't snap well together. We bought two of these and the first one went together more easily than the second. The seat doesn't fit well or close quite properly; major parts are low quality and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul of Maine

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to put my pool toys in. Works well for that. Not really using it to sit on, but seems sturdy enough. Only real issue I have is that some of the pieces did not fit together as well as they should have. I have a gap on the back side where it will not stay snapped together. It will work until I build my own.
customer_reviews.author: michael b bennett

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble, it took about 45 minutes. It has steel reinforcements strategically placed, and can hold my 6'4 300 lb body just fine. We added a cushion from Menard's, and it is very comfortable. Best of all, holds all of our patio furniture cushions very nicely!
customer_reviews.author: S. Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Was super easy to assemble by myself. Pay attention to the pieces as most are specifically for the L or R side of the bench and cannot simply be interchanged. (Be careful with the last step— one of those pieces is meant for the L side of the back rest and the other for the R side. You cannot take them out once they are hammered in.)
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Bertele

customer_reviews.title: To Be Disappointed or Not To Be Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I am so heartbroken about this product. My husband and I spent hours assembling this, and the parts did not fit correctly, and the piece overall just looks so cheap. We were hoping to show it off for our Fourth of July party tomorrow, but we can't. It was supposed to be a surprise for my husband and show him that I could buy a quality product on my own. It was expensive too, so now we're stuck with it. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: LML

customer_reviews.title: READ THE DIRECTIONS
customer_reviews.text: I saw many reviews stating that this bench was not sturdy. You have to READ THE DIRECTIONS!! My husband put this together in 30 minutes (taking his time) and when it was done, we both sat on it. It was perfectly fine. It has to be on a flat surface. It is now holding all my pool towels and has room to spare!! Very nice looking, sturdy bench. I recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Myra G. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, the frame will bulge apart if you ...
customer_reviews.text: 1. Missing parts, the sleeve which held all the spares was ripped and spares were missing 2. No installation Manual 3. Parts looked damaged 4. Poor Quality, the frame will bulge apart if you keep anything other than cushion covers inside 5. Waste of Money - this is not going to last at all... 6. Will need addition support - i see this as a DIY Project to make this work. Easy to install once you see a few youtube videos Looks good, once you put it together
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Works for what we need it for
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this bench for more seating and storage on our pontoon boat. It sits maybe three people but more comfortably two. It was easy to assemble except a few pieces were difficult to line up. The top is dark brown and does fade in the sun, but doesn’t affect the performance of the bench. It does not leak so it keeps things dry when it rains. It is made of a cheaper material but does the job we needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Wolverine65

customer_reviews.title: It also looks very plastic the closer u get but from across the yard if looks really really nice. Overall it’s decent for the price and we ...
customer_reviews.text: This took a bit longer to put together by myself then the instructions suggest. It’s a cute bench especially if you add some throw pillows on there. We don’t use it to sit on really but that option is there for anyone coming over to take off their shoes. With that said and us not really using it to sit in, the arm rest is often coming undone which drives me crazy. It also looks very plastic the closer u get but from across the yard if looks really really nice. Overall it’s decent for the price and we are happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Josepha

customer_reviews.title: Hard no
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poor quality bench. The assembly seemed easy enough but none of my parts lined up as they should have and it took way more work than it should have for them to “click” together. (And yes, I read the instructions. 🙄). We have a larger bench from the same brand that we bought more than 8 years ago that only recently got a small crack on the top when my teenage son jumped on it. I expected this to be similar quality, and I’m very disappointed. The plastic is flimsy. I don’t plan to even sit on it. I’ll be surprised if it lasts a year without cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Faulconer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, does the trick and stores my pool supplies.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these benches for my pool deck and just love them. Shipping from amazon had them going through usps which was a huge issue since our rural mail carrier did not have a big enough car to deliver them. I had to go pick them up myself! The boxes are huge but the product is excellent. I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Hydrangeas

customer_reviews.title: I rate this a good product even though I had a problem
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble if you identify all the part "accurately" before you start. I did have one issue in that the left front corner wouldn't stay latched together - something I found out after the assembly was complete. Rather than ship the whole thing back or risk damaging everything by trying to un-interlok all the pieces, I ended up putting a screw through the front facia and side panel latch. That is holding up well and I don't expect any issues since there's no real stress on that connection and, other than that, this is a super unit. But having a failed component dropped my rating from Love it to Like it.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Provides comfortable bench seating for two or three with a weight capacity of 771 lbs, I weigh 251 lbs per my last visit to Doctor within last week. Sat on bench and it cracked. So great for storage or kids but adults beware. Of course since I bought through Amazon returning is not an option.
customer_reviews.author: bill5

customer_reviews.title: Like assembling a snap together toy that just doen't fit
customer_reviews.text: Not a quality product. I would NOT buy this product. The instructions were poorly written and illustrated. Molded vinyl that is not a good fit or professional look. This will work well for a child's outdoor toys but due to poor construction beware of "creepy crawlers" making a home.
customer_reviews.author: mike m

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was not a durable as I was thinking for the price. While putting it together 2 pieces cracked,
customer_reviews.author: DEANNA PEEPLES

customer_reviews.title: Storage for my sprays.
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son can assemble the bench. Instruction are very clearly written. I agree that product is not strong enough to accommodate more than 350 lbs. Little bit flimsy. I intend to use for all my bug spray, weed spray, fertilizer and other chemical. I do not want to keep those in my garage because of my kids.Storage floor can handle only upto 35 lbs. I placed couple of half inch thick plank under the bench to support storage floor so that it can handle heavy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce5714

customer_reviews.title: Strength and Beauty
customer_reviews.text: What a Bench it withstood the rain and winds and when the big storm hit I found very little water inside all I had to do was adjust the bench and no more rain water. I sit on this in the evenings and my Hubby put it together for me. I store all my puppy outside gear inside nod it holds 70 Gallons!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Jo Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: Did not say PRODUCT will be damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Keter Eden 70 Gal All Weather Outdoor Patio Storage Bench Deck Box , Beige/Brown Sold by: Amazon.com Services, Inc Return eligible through Jul 12, 2019 $99.44 Condition: Used - Very Good - Item will come in original packaging. Packaging will be damaged. It would be easy to assemble if the footing was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: AprilRayne

customer_reviews.title: it looks like several other customers returned it ahead of me
customer_reviews.text: This was suppose to be an inspected return. The original customer attempted to install and the parts were broken either through faulty assembly or parts were defective, Based on the significant damage to the shipping container, it looks like several other customers returned it ahead of me. Beware of buying returns, my expeience with other items is Amazon does not inspect returned items.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Canko

customer_reviews.title: False product description...piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed was that the seating weight capacity was 350 lbs on the instruction manual, not the 700+ lbs as described on the product page. Thought I would give it a shot and the thing cracked right in the middle of the seat..I'm a big boy, but nowhere near 350. Hopefully it holds up well as a storage unit for the patio but as a bench it's absolute garbage. It was easy to put together so I guess that's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I use this bench to store all my kids outdoor toys (bubbles chalk etc) and was able to put it together by myself with three toddlers trying to help.. and it’s lasted outside for a year now in Ohio’s unpredictable weather with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Debbie P

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a total let down it is literally molded plastic pieces, reminded me of a fisher price playhouse, waterproof no, This should be marketed as a child's toybox. This in no way qualifies as an outdoor seating bench for adults.
customer_reviews.author: BURNS B

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great bench for the price. It was pretty easy to put together, my husband and I were able to assemble it in about 30 minutes. I waited to write the review to see how it held up in a few rainstorms and I’m happy to report everything stayed dry. Very happy with the purchase. It not only has lots of great space for storage but the bench seems pretty sturdy to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage Bench
customer_reviews.text: This has been on my deck all spring and summer. It has not leaked so I keep my throw rugs and pillows in it. It looks great on the deck and it's extra seating. Very pleased with this purchase. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: LARAINE

customer_reviews.title: Very poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Came with some minor parts missing. Called Ketter and emailed them about missing parts. No replies and this was weeks ago. Product is sturdy and attractive on the deck but it’s still missing parts. That’s why I’m giving it one star.
customer_reviews.author: bjs10

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Cheap piece.
customer_reviews.text: Not real easy to assemble and there were two of us. There was a broken piece. Just went to scoot it, and it came apart. I have no idea how to get it back together. It IS water proof as it’s plastic, but, if it’s rained or whatever, when you open the seat, every bit of water pours into the storage area. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought but good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench to put by my pool for pooltoys and the kids to sit on. First thing is the bottom is made of cheap foam material that will not last through the rain or water from the pool. Will be replacing with solid wood. Secondly plastic is flimsy and not smooth. Also it came with scratches and broken in one place. I’m assuming from being shipped. Thirdly good buy for the money but wouldn’t say it’s water prof. Not that easy to assemble alone either.
customer_reviews.author: Kc5225

customer_reviews.title: Overall good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this especially with package thefts on the rise, even without the lock it’s a great way to hide small stuff. It’s not beautiful but it is nice looking and feels sturdy enough with two people sitting on it. I feel like locking it won’t help since it appears you can pop the back part of the bench up since it’s not hinged in with metal.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made JUNK!!! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed overall. Poor quality, CHEAPLY made, anything over 200lbs will break this bench. I wouldn’t pay more then $30 dollars for this bench. This item is a ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: JDP55

customer_reviews.title: Well made; easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the easiest assemblies I've done in a long while. The pieces are light and the holes were pre-drilled well. Once assembled, it is sturdy and has a good storage capacity - decent quality for the money. It looks like garden furniture which is nice for a patio.
customer_reviews.author: Calliope Telling

product_meta.title: Keter Eden 70 Gallon Storage Bench Deck Box for Patio Furniture, Front Porch Decor and Outdoor Seating – Perfect to Store Garden Tools and Pool Toys
product_meta.description: Do you need secure storage that doesn't waste valuable garden space or cheapen your decor? Keter's 70-Gallon Eden Storage Bench is both a spacious outdoor storage solution and a practical, beautiful garden bench. The Eden provides enough seating room to accommodate two adults and makes a perfect deck box, romantic garden resting spot or functional, space-saving indoor storage box.
feature_bullets: IDEAL SIZE: Exterior: 54. 6 in. L x 23. 4 in. W x 32. 8 in. H / Interior: 50. 4 in. L x 19. 7 in. W x 15 in. H
LARGE CAPACITY: 70 gallons of extra hidden storage underneath the seat
RESIN CONSTRUCTION: It's made out of all weather-resistant resin with an appealing wood-look texture
DURABLE AND STRONG: Weather-resistant polypropylene construction prevents rusting, peeling and denting - unlike real wood
EXTRA SEATING: Provides comfortable bench seating for two or three with a weight capacity of 771 lbs
LOCKABLE: Works with standard padlocks, which are sold separately
STYLISH: Elegant natural wood look texture to fit any outdoor patio décor
VERSATILE STORAGE: Perfect place to store outdoor patio furniture cushions, outdoor toys, pool accessories, and beach towels

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars2,330 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
